name: Flutter Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa && curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.10.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.10.5-stable.tar.xz && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/workspaces/flutter/flutter/bin"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc && chmod +x /workspaces/flutter/flutter/bin/flutter && flutter doctor
